mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_search (job_content_title, job_content, job_genre, job_art_title, job_start_date, job_production_date, job_to, job_pay, job_gender, job_contact, job_deadline, user_id) VALUES (#{jobContentTitle}, #{jobContent}, #{jobGenre}, #{jobArtTitle}, #{jobStartDate}, #{jobProductionDate}, #{jobTo}, #{jobPay}, #{jobGender}, #{jobContact}, #{jobDeadline}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE job_search SET job_content_title = #{jobContentTitle}, job_content = #{jobContent}, job_genre = #{jobGenre}, job_art_title = #{jobArtTitle}, job_start_date = #{jobStartDate}, job_production_date = #{jobProductionDate}, job_to = #{jobTo}, job_gender = #{jobGender}, job_contact = #{jobContact}, job_deadline = #{jobDeadline} WHERE job_id = #{jobId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND job_status != 'deleted'
mapper.delete: UPDATE job_search SET job_status = 'deleted' WHERE job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likey WHERE job_id = #{jobId}) as likeyCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM view WHERE job_id = #{jobId}) as viewCount, if(l.likey_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) as isLikey, l.likey_id FROM job_search j LEFT JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM likey WHERE user_id = #{userId}) l ON j.job_id = l.job_id WHERE j.job_id = #{jobId} AND j.job_status != 'deleted'

SELECT j.job_id AS jobId, j.job_genre AS jobGenre, j.job_deadline AS jobDeadline, j.job_content_title AS jobContentTitle, u.user_profile_img AS userProfileImg, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_career AS userCareer, u.user_id AS userId, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS viewCount, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS commentCount, COALESCE(l.likey_count, 0) AS likeyCount, IF(DATEDIFF(j.job_deadline, CURDATE()) < 0, true, false) AS isDead, IF(DATE(j.created_at) = CURDATE(), TRUE, FALSE) AS isToday FROM job_search j JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON j.job_id = v.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comment WHERE comment_status = 'active' GROUP BY job_id ) c ON j.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS likey_count FROM likey GROUP BY job_id ) l ON j.job_id = l.job_id WHERE j.job_status = 'active' ORDER BY j.created_at DESC;

SELECT j.job_id AS jobId, j.job_genre AS jobGenre, j.job_deadline AS jobDeadline, j.job_content_title AS jobContentTitle, u.user_profile_img AS userProfileImg, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_career AS userCareer, u.user_id AS userId, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS viewCount, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS commentCount, COALESCE(l.likey_count, 0) AS likeyCount, IF(DATEDIFF(j.job_deadline, CURDATE()) < 0, true, false) AS isDead, IF(DATE(j.created_at) = CURDATE(), TRUE, FALSE) AS isToday FROM job_search j JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON j.job_id = v.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comment WHERE comment_status = 'active' GROUP BY job_id ) c ON j.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS likey_count FROM likey GROUP BY job_id ) l ON j.job_id = l.job_id WHERE j.job_status = 'active' ORDER BY likeyCount DESC LIMIT 8
